name: Disc Rooms
description:
Disc Rooms is a quick roguelike that was made for the Disc Room Game Jam!  You get one weapon: a disc gun, and you have to fight your way to the exit without getting chopped up by your own discs.

There's only a few rooms (and a yellow square for a goal) so the game goes pretty quickly.   This is my first time trying to make a roguelike so there's a few bugs here and there, but I'm hoping to add some more enemies, rooms, floors, and features in the future.  I hope you like it!

Also sorry but you'll have to Alt-f4 the game!
